comment: Physics is a hard class, but professor Barker goes out his way to help his students in any way possible. If it was not for this professor I would not have passed Phsyics. By far one of the best professors at Kennesaw. Love him. He actually cares about his students and how well they do in his class.

This is not an easy subject but Mr. Barker does his best to boil it down to simple arithmetic. Required homework most every week, four quizzes (really tests) and a comprehensive final. If you do the homework and practice quizzes you will do fine. Recommended.

Had him for phys 1 n 2. very easy lot of homewrk problems if u do homewrk and last semseters test before the test u will do great. homwrk is graded and will help u if u dont understand test is hard but will give take home test then averg the two thts u test grade does it everytime
Had him for 2 semesters of physics, wouldn't recommend anyone else.  Great teacher.
Great teacher and a good guy.
